name: Spotify
title: spotify.com
shortDescription: Spotify is a digital music streaming service that offers access to millions of songs, podcasts, and videos from artists all over the world. It is designed for music lovers and content creators who seek a vast library of audio content. Users can explore new music, create playlists, and enjoy personalized recommendations. An example use case is a user discovering new artists through the platform's curated playlists and radio stations.
cons: Occasional ads in the free version
Limited offline playback on free tier
High data usage without offline mode

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Apple Music
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Offers exclusive content and integration with iOS.

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Amazon Music
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Includes features for Amazon Echo users.

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Deezer
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Available in more countries than Spotify.
